definition: proceeding in small stages, (Roman Catholic Church) an antiphon (usually from the Book of Psalms) immediately after the epistle at Mass
details:
adjective
- proceeding in small stages
= example: proceeding in small stages
- (of a topographical gradient) not steep or abrupt
= example: (of a topographical gradient) not steep or abrupt
noun
- (Roman Catholic Church) an antiphon (usually from the Book of Psalms) immediately after the epistle at Mass
